name: Bloody Armguards
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Bloody armguards are an artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
Bloody armguards allow you to 'raise' a fallen comrade.
